transcript:
Hello

Hello
Haa good morning sir, sir se baat kar rahe hain?
Haa main.
Sir main Kritika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Haa.
Sir aapne kal hamari customer care pe call karaya tha aapko buyleads nahi aaye aap bata rahe the.

Hello.
Thodi der mein call karte hain.
Sir voice aa rahi hai aapko meri?

Hello.
Hello.
Hanji sir abhi aap free hai ya main kitne baje aapko connect karu?
Haa abhi 11 baje karu?
Haa.
Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not receive buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive will call the customer at 11 AM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer at 11 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral
